files.README.md:
# Vue + JS Boilerplate

This is a boilerplate project generated by CodeJumpstart - Fuel your projects, one setup at a time.

## Project Structure

- `src/App.vue`: Main Vue component.
- `src/main.js`: Entry point for the Vue application.
- `src/styles.css`: Styles for the application.
- `src/components/Navbar.vue`: Simple Navbar component.
- `src/views/Home.vue`: Home page view.
- `src/views/About.vue`: About page view.

## Setup

1. Run `npm install` to install dependencies.
2. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server.

## Author

Created by [Amaan Ul Haq Siddiqui](https://www.linkedin.com/in/amaanulhaqsiddiqui/).
